p: Studies conducted in India, Jamaica, Japan, the Philippines, and other countries corroborate the widespread nature of ICV and general age distribution already described [ 77, 78, 79, 80, 81, 82, 83]. Collectively, these data indicate that ICV infection is widespread globally with most infections occurring in young children. ICV is uncommon in hospitalized adults but has caused outbreaks in military recruits [ 84, 85, 86, 87, 88]. ICV has been reported among travelers on the Hajj pilgrimage [ 89].
